snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin wasn’t about to call out Eli Manning for a misguided pass in the waning moments of the Giants’ loss, knowing full well that his quarterback would likely take the blame anyway.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column remarks on New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin's unwillingness to reprimand quarterback Eli Manning for a mistake that cost them a game against the Philadelphia Eagles.
lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin wasn’t about to call out Eli Manning for a misguided pass in the waning moments of the Giants’ loss, knowing full well that his quarterback would likely take the blame anyway.

headline.seo: Tom Coughlin Goes Easy on Giants Quarterback Eli Manning for Mistake
headline.main: What Was Left Unsaid: Manning Made Mistake
headline.print_headline: What Was Left Unsaid: Manning Made Mistake
